action.action-desc: Mr. Jones introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to permit dependents of retired members of the Armed Forces who reside in military housing to attend Department of Defense elementary and secondary schools.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Continuity of Education for Military Retired Dependents Act.

section.header: Education for dependents of certain retired members of the Armed Forces
section.text: Section 2164(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting , dependents of retirees, after dependents of members of the armed forces; and
by inserting and the dependents of such retirees after such members of the armed forces; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

For purposes of this subsection, the term retiree means a member or former member of the armed forces who is entitled to retired or retainer pay under this title, or who, but for age, would be eligible for retired or retainer pay under chapter 1223 of this title.
